head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths JOYCE, EDMUND J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths JOYCE, EDMUND J.

block.p: JOYCE-Edmund J. On August 5, 2000. Retired Deputy Chief, NYPD. Beloved husband of Peggy (nee Browne). Loving father of Jeanne Burke, Edmund Jr., and Margaret Dalton. Dear brother of Joseph, Margaret Killian, Helen Buchheit, Marie, Theresa and Veronica. Also survived by nine grandchildren. Reposing Dennis S. O'Connor, 91-05 Beach Channel Drive, Rockaway Beach. Mass of Christian Burial at St. Thomas More Church, Tuesday, 9:30 AM. Visiting Sunday, 7-10, and Monday, 2-5 and 7-10 PM. Interment Resurrection Cemetery, Staten Island.
